description: [NightClub](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1090) can use multiple native APIs including `GetKeyState`, `GetForegroundWindow`, `GetWindowThreadProcessId`, and `GetKeyboardLayout`.(Citation: MoustachedBouncer ESET August 2023)

external_references.description: Faou, M. (2023, August 10). MoustachedBouncer: Espionage against foreign diplomats in Belarus. Retrieved September 25, 2023.
